name: I Drive, I Scream, You Eat da' Ice Cream
name_original: I Drive, I Scream, You Eat da' Ice Cream
description:
Drive around the beach and deliver ice cream to the beach visitors while pulling sick stunts like drifting and flying over piers, because why not.

You have 60 seconds to serve 10 customers! Experiment with paths to find the best way to achieve.

Deliver Da' Ice Cream.

HOW TO PLAY

W, S keys = Drive forward, reverse

A, D keys = Turn left, right

R key = Reorient vehicle

ART

Roque Tacsa

Fernando Villegas

PROGRAMMING

Ian Smith

DESIGN

Tim Ray

Made in Unreal 5
